from django_filters import rest_framework as filters

from client.models.user import S1User



[文档]class S1UserFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    nick_name = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr='contains')
    phone = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr='contains')
    is_active = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr='contains')


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = S1User
        fields = ["nick_name", "is_active", "phone"]
